    • Method Detail

      • getGroovyFilters

        public java.lang.String getGroovyFilters(java.util.List<ChartFilter> conditions,
                                java.lang.String parentField)
        Method to convert chart filter list to groovy expression string. Each filter of list will be joined by logical operator(logicalOp) selected.
        Parameters:
        conditions - List for chart filters.
        parentField - Field that represent parent. Generally mappedBy field for object used in relational fields (o2m/m2m).
        Returns:
        Groovy expression string.

      • getGroovyCondition

        private java.lang.String getGroovyCondition(ChartFilter chartFilter,
                                  java.lang.String parentField)
        Method to generate groovy expression for a single chart filter.
        Parameters:
        chartFilter - Chart filter to use .
        parentField - Parent field.
        Returns:
        Groovy expression string.
